attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Years and years have passed where the Armed forces get a 3% increase each year. why is it that they lay there lives down for pennies. Everyday they are under threat from Terrorists. where as footballers kick a ball up and down a pitch and get paid more in a month than they earn in two years or more.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
